thread.title: Convenient location near Paddington
thread.title_full: Convenient location near Paddington - Review of Days Inn London Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Vic D
title: Convenient location near Paddington
text:
Decided to stay here since I had to catch an early flight from Heathrow and hotel is 5 minutes walk from Paddington station which has an express train to LHR.
Room is adequate. Bathroom is very clean. Window facing the street is not well insulated for cold and noise. Breakfast choices were ok.
Excellent location near a variety of restaurants and also quick access on Tube to the city.
Good option and would stay here again.
